thread.title: Sayyed Houthi Praises Activating Martyrdom Operations in Tel Aviv
thread.title_full: Sayyed Houthi Praises Activating Martyrdom Operations in Tel Aviv

title: Sayyed Houthi Praises Activating Martyrdom Operations in Tel Aviv
text:
Leader of Yemen’s Ansarullah Movement, Sayyed Abdul-Malik Badreddine Al-Houthi hailed on Thursday the
martyrdom operation in “Tel Aviv” (occupied Jaffa), addinvg that the return of such operations is a successful step with great importance.
In a televised speech, Sayyed Houthi indicated that, this week, the Yemeni armed forces carried out 21 operations using ballistic and cruise missiles, drones, and naval vessels, adding that the accumulating number of ships targeted due to their connection to the “Israeli” enemy and for violating the blockade has reached 182 ships.
“Our people are determined to continue the fight as long as the crimes of the Israeli enemy against the Palestinian people persist.”
In this regard, the Yemeni Armed Forces announced on Thursday that it would release a statement later on the same day to unveil a new operation.
Sayyed Houthi stressed that
Hezbollah front remains active and intense, and that the Israeli enemy acknowledges its human losses and the significant impact of this.
“The enemy is anxiously anticipating the imminent retaliatory operation from Hezbollah to avenge the martyr commander Sayyed Fouad Shukr.”
The Yemeni Leader affirmed that the response to the Zionist enemy will be painful and impactful, and that the planning for this is one of the reasons for the delay.
Source: Al-Manar English Website
